text: Buduaar (from ) is an Estonian women's magazine. It was founded in Tallinn in 2003. Its content generally includes articles discussing fashion, beauty, family, sex, health, alternative medicine, and esotericism. The magazine is published 6 times a year. The chief executive officer is Marge Tava. ==References== == External links == * * Category:Magazines established in 2003 Category:Quarterly magazines Category:Women's magazines Category:Bilingual magazines Category:Estonian-language magazines Category:Russian-language magazines Category:Women's fashion magazines Category:2003 establishments in Estonia
title: Buduaar
